Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LJ-hep2(66-86) (natural AMPs, hepcidin, Cys-rich; fish, animals)

Literature.Author: Gong R, An Z, Zhang W, Chen F, Wang KJ. 2022
Literature.Title: The Antimicrobial Peptide LJ-hep2 from Lateolabrax japonicus Exerting Activities against Multiple Pathogenic Bacteria and Immune Protection In Vivo

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (86.36%) tohepcidin TH1-5C: 38%.Activity: active against Gram- S. flexneri (MIC 3-6 uM), P. fluorescens (MIC 6-12 uM), P. stutzeri (MIC 1.5-3 um), E. coli QZ18109 or QZ18110 (MIC 3-12 uM), P. aeruginosa QZ19124 or QZ19125 (MIC 6-12 uM), A. baumannii QZ18050A or QZ18055 (MIC 1.5-3 uM), K. pneumoniae QZ18106 or QZ18107 (MIC 6-24 uM), A. hydrophila (MIC 24-48 uM), E. tarda (MIC 24-48 uM), A. sobria (MIC 24-48 uM), Gram+ S. epidermidis (MIC 6-12 uM), C. glutamicum (MIC 3-6 uM), B. subtilis (MIC 6-12 uM), E.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (86.36%) tohepcidin TH1-5C: 38%.Activity: active against Gram- S. flexneri (MIC 3-6 uM), P. fluorescens (MIC 6-12 uM), P. stutzeri (MIC 1.5-3 um), E. coli QZ18109 or QZ18110 (MIC 3-12 uM), P. aeruginosa QZ19124 or QZ19125 (MIC 6-12 uM), A. baumannii QZ18050A or QZ18055 (MIC 1.5-3 uM), K. pneumoniae QZ18106 or QZ18107 (MIC 6-24 uM), A. hydrophila (MIC 24-48 uM), E. tarda (MIC 24-48 uM), A. sobria (MIC 24-48 uM), Gram+ S. epidermidis (MIC 6-12 uM), C. glutamicum (MIC 3-6 uM), B. subtilis (MIC 6-12 uM), E. faecium QZ18080 (MIC 6-12 uM) and fungi C. neoformans (MIC 12-24 uM).
